Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan and the Circus Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's unexpected involvement in a circus conflict, starting from his introduction as a performer to his heroic intervention against sabotage and subsequent departure.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan and the spectacle of the circus, setting the initial context.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Circus and Giraffe Sighting

sub_scenes.title: Investigating the Cry for Help
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the initial investigation into a cry for help, leading to a confrontation and attack on Paul Bunyan.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Billings and 'The Strongest Man'

sub_scenes.title: Resolving the Immediate Threat and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the immediate aftermath of the fight, an explanation of the conflict, and a job proposition for Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Revenge Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Matto Grasso's vengeful plot and his initial attempt to sabotage the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan, the Circus Strongman and Grasso's Envy
Setting the Tent Ablaze and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Gorilla Release and Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's second sabotage attempt involving a gorilla, leading to a chase and confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Big Ape is Set Loose
Paul Bunyan Grabs Gigantico and Flees

sub_scenes.title: Trapeze Fight and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the fight between Paul Bunyan and his pursuer in the arena, culminating in the pursuer's capture.

sub_scenes.title: Refusing the Job and Leaving
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Paul Bunyan's circus involvement as he declines the job offer and decides to return to his peaceful life.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Marco Polo's fantastical adventure in Tibet, involving mystical encounters, a talking severed head, and a quest to rescue a princess from an ogress's castle.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Encounter and Severed Head Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo in Tibet and his bizarre discovery of a talking severed head in a forest.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with the Awful Ogress of Tibet
Discovery and Plea of the Severed Head

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Hi-toun with Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes Marco Polo's journey to Hi-toun guided by the severed head, revealing a city in mourning.

narrative_arcs.title: The Gift of the Sacred Dagger and the Journey to Hi-toun
Arrival at Hi-toun and the City's Mourning

sub_scenes.title: Hi-toun and Princess Lotus Mystery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the city's grief over Princess Lotus's disappearance and sets up Marco's encounter with the ogress.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Arrives in Hi-toun and Learns of Trouble
The Grief over Princess Lotus's Disappearance
A Plea for Help and the Suspicious Castle
Entering the Mysterious Castle and Summoning 'Poor Children'
The 'Poor Children' Revealed as Rats and Marco's Disgust
Confinement and the Pretense of Hospitality
Realization of Treachery and Ogress Revelation
Summoning the Monstrous Mice and Preparing for Battle
Sword Against Claws: The Fight Begins

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Capture and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco's capture by the ogress and his subsequent escape using a magic knife.

sub_scenes.title: Return and Royal Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Marco Polo's adventure with the rescue of the princess, her joyful reunion with her father, and Marco's royal reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife
Unusual Mourning Decorations and Safe Return Request

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of greed and betrayal over a hidden treasure, leading to revenge, violence, and a grim moral lesson.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper Prologue and Penal Colony Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Treasure Keeper narrating a story and sets the scene in a British penal colony.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Penal Colony and Captain's Inquiry

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Offer and Escape Deal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the prisoner's offer of treasure to the Captain in exchange for help with escape.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Vow for Revenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the Captain's betrayal and Joseph Jordan's vow for revenge after years of imprisonment.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in England and Renewed Vow

sub_scenes.title: Finding Brooking and Midnight Meeting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's vigil and confrontation with Captain Brooking, leading to a midnight meeting.

sub_scenes.title: Attic Treasure and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in violence as the midnight meeting turns into a deadly confrontation over the treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Police Investigation and Moral
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the treasure story with a police investigation, a failed escape, and a final moral reflection.

Major_Arcs.title: Vincent Matthews's Condemnation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc briefly focuses on Vincent Matthews's trial and sentencing for murder, highlighting his hatred and impending doom.

sub_scenes.title: Opening Fight and Courtroom Transition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contains an initial unrelated fight scene before transitioning to a courtroom setting.

sub_scenes.title: Verdict and Hatred
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Vincent Matthews receiving his death sentence and expressing his intense hatred.

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunting of Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Henry Northrup's investigation into the haunting of Matthews Estate, leading to a confrontation with a vengeful spirit and its eventual redemption.

sub_scenes.title: Realtor's Problem and Northrup's Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the problem of the haunted Matthews estate and the realtor seeking help from Henry Northrup.

narrative_arcs.title: The Realtor's Problem with Matthews Estate
Concerns about Disposing of the Matthews Estate
Rumors of Vincent Matthews' Ghost and Tenant Troubles

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Warning at Matthews Estate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Northrup's arrival at the estate and the initial warnings about the evil presence within the house.

narrative_arcs.title: Warning of Evil and Strange Occurrences at the Old House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Northrup's direct confrontation and physical struggle with the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Assault and Claim of Superiority

sub_scenes.title: Philosophical Dialogue and Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a philosophical dialogue between Northrup (as the cloaked man) and Vincent Matthews (as the pale man) about fear, hatred, and salvation.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession and the Path to Salvation
Revelation of Murder and the Need for Forgiveness

sub_scenes.title: Forcing Confrontation and Summoning Rosalind
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes Northrup forcing Vincent Matthews to confront his past and summoning the spirit of his murdered sister, Rosalind.

sub_scenes.title: Forgiveness, Love and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the haunting narrative with Rosalind's forgiveness and brotherly love freeing Vincent's spirit, and Northrup explaining the resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: The Plea for Brotherly Love and Redemption
Entering the House and Explaining Unexplained Events

Major_Arcs.title: The Tragedy of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical tragedy of Henry Hudson's voyages, his ambition to find the Northwest Passage, and the mutiny that led to his demise.

sub_scenes.title: Fate Introduction and Voyage Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the tragic fate of Henry Hudson and the Dutch East India Company's proposition for his voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unsolved Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition to Captain Hudson

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Failure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes Hudson's first voyage, the crew's discontent, and the exploration of the Hudson River, ending in failure.

narrative_arcs.title: Crew's Discontent and Exploration of Hudson River
Hudson's Failure and Return to Holland

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hudson's second, ill-fated voyage, the crew's despair in the ice, and the eventual mutiny and banishment of Hudson.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage Backed and Hudson's Hope
Extreme Northerly Route and Crew's Despair

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Rescue of the Kidnapped Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the heroic quest of Hassan, the Arabian Knight, to rescue a kidnapped daughter from Tartar invaders, showcasing his bravery, cunning, and eventual romantic reward.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan and the Tartar threat, setting up his mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Arabian Knight and the Tartar Threat
Summoning and Mission Briefing by the Caliph
The Rescue Mission: Kidnapped Daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Traveler's Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Hassan's journey towards the Tartar camp, including his stop at the oasis and encounter with a warning traveler.

narrative_arcs.title: Hassan Sets Out to Confront the Tartars
Journey to the Oasis of El Sholem
Discovery of Tartar Trail at the Oasis
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Offering of Water and Continued Warning

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Detection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's infiltration into the Tartar camp, his search for the captive, and his detection by guards.

narrative_arcs.title: Reaching the Outskirts and Preparing to Strike
Inside the Camp - Seeking the Daughter

sub_scenes.title: Fight and Kurgan's Challenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hassan's fight with the guards, his capture, and Kurgan's challenge to a duel.

narrative_arcs.title: The Signal and the Unfair Fight Begins
Victory Assured and Demands to Kurgan

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Romantic Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Hassan's mission with Kurgan's departure and the development of a romantic relationship between Hassan and the rescued woman.
